info.+content: わんだふるぷりきゅあ！

Second-year middle school student Iroha Inukai is best friend with her dog named Komugi. They're living in Animal Town, a place where humans and animals live together peacefully. Out for a walk one day, Iroha and Komugi encounter a mysterious creature named Garugaru, who goes on a rampage in the town. Komugi suddenly transforms into a Precure named Cure Wonderful, to protect Iroha.
"Wonderful Precure! evolution!!" (わんだふるぷりきゅあ！evolution!!) by Chihaya Yoshitake
#1: "FUN☆FUN☆Wonderful DAYS!" (FUN☆FUN☆わんだふるDAYS！) by Ami Ishii and Moeha Nochimoto (eps 1-22)
#2: "Happiness Evolu~tion♡ ~Komugi & Iroha Ver.~" (しあわせえぼりゅ～しょん♡ ～こむぎ＆いろはVer.～) by Ami Ishii and Moeha Nochimoto (eps 23, 25, 27, 29, 31, 35, 37, 39, 41, 43, 45, 47, 49)
#3: "Happiness Evolu~tion♡ ~Yuki & Mayu Ver.~" (しあわせえぼりゅ～しょん♡ ～ユキ＆まゆVer.～) by Ami Ishii and Moeha Nochimoto (eps 24, 26, 28, 30, 32, 36, 38, 40, 42, 44, 46, 48)
#4: "Happy≒Future" by Moeha Nochimoto and Chihaya Yoshitake (eps 33-34)
"Smile's Unison♪ ~Precure! Idol Smiling!~" (笑顔のユニゾン♪ ～プリキュア！アイドルスマイリング！～) by Misato Matsuoka (ep 50)
わんだふるぷりきゅあ！ | 東映アニメーション
